name: CGU Audits Requested by Police Investigation
description: CGU audits requested by police investigation. Contains audit data and findings from investigations conducted by Brazil's Office of the Comptroller General.

name: CGU Random Audits 2006-2015
description: CGU random audits between 2006 and 2015. Comprehensive dataset of random municipal audits conducted by Brazil's Office of the Comptroller General over a 10-year period.

name: Transparent Brazil Program Data
description: CGU data on the Transparent Brazil Program. Dataset contains information about Brazil's transparency initiatives and related governmental programs administered by the CGU.
